user_description.ru: Вы боретесь на полу, рычите, кусаете друг друга. Царапины на спине, укусы в шею.
user_description.en: You wrestle on the floor, growling, biting each other. Scratches on the back, bites on the neck.

ai_description.ru: Отпустить контроль и поддаться инстинктам. Укусы, царапины, рычание, борьба за доминирование. Сырая, животная энергия.
ai_description.en: Letting go of control and surrendering to instincts. Biting, scratching, growling, wrestling for dominance. Raw, animal energy.

image_prompt: man and woman wrestling on floor, her biting his neck while he grips her back, disheveled clothes partially torn, living room with scattered items
